overview:
Online pr and social media consultant and trainer at Econsultancy.

Professional digital public relations and social media marketing communications consultant with 13 years’ agency/consultancy experience.

Key clients include Camelot (National Lottery Online), Dominos, Norwich Union, Barclays, eBay, Coca Cola, Diageo, TUI and Random House.

Specialties:

-Online Public Relations consultancy and implementation

  • Social Media marketing Online issues management consultancy
  • Online Public Relations and Social Media training
  • Online Reputation Monitoring
  • SEO Public Relations
